title: Walkercito, freelancer with +5 years of experience. Welcome!
description: Freelance programmer and 3D artist. Specializing in Python, TypeScript, and automation. Turning creative ideas into reality. EN/ES/IT.
name: Walkercito
about: Hey! I'm a freelance dev who loves building stuff with Python and TypeScript. I do a bit of everything - bots, web apps, automation scripts, you name it. Also super into 3D printing and modeling with Blender. Currently exploring game dev with Godot, embedded systems using Raspberry Pi and ESP32, and backend optimization. If you've got a cool idea, let's make it happen!

experience.title: Freelance Programmer
experience.subtitle: Bots, web apps, and automation
experience.description: Been building Discord/Telegram bots, web apps, and automation tools for clients. Mostly Python stuff but I jump into whatever's needed.

experience.title: 3D Artist
experience.subtitle: 3D printing & animation
experience.description: Did a bunch of 3D modeling and animation work, mainly for printing. Created custom designs and helped people bring their ideas to life.

experience.title: DevOps & Backend at Begonlabs
experience.subtitle: RitterFinder, OndAI, CETU
experience.description: Built and maintain backends, databases, scrapers, automation pipelines, and SaaS systems. Optimized data ingestion, multi-channel messaging, and deployment processes using Python, Playwright, Supabase, and CI/CD workflows.

projects.title: ArcadiaNET
projects.subtitle: 90s-style IRC chatroom
projects.description: A throwback to the old-school IRC days. Real-time chat, emojis, retro vibes. Built it with Reflex just for fun and to learn the framework.

projects.title: Mr. Gato Landing
projects.subtitle: Astro landing page
projects.description: My first Astro project! Made a clean landing page for Mr. Gato's pricing. Was fun learning a new framework.

projects.title: Mr. Gato
projects.subtitle: AI Discord bot
projects.description: Built this way before AI bots were everywhere. It could actually hold conversations with users. Pretty ahead of its time tbh. (Offline now)

projects.title: BlueLights
projects.subtitle: Bluetooth LED controller
projects.description: Got tired of the crappy app for my LED lights so I made my own. Python library + PyQt6 GUI. Can do fading, strobe, rainbow - all the fun stuff.

projects.title: Adeptus Studio
projects.subtitle: Multi-purpose Discord bot
projects.description: The Swiss army knife of Discord bots. Moderation, tickets, project management, payment tracking... basically everything my server needed.

projects.title: Crypto Exchange Bot
projects.subtitle: P2P trading automation
projects.description: Automated secure crypto trades between users on Discord, including ticket creation, balance handling, swap automation, fee collection, and anti-fraud mechanisms.

projects.title: Hacienda Scraper
projects.subtitle: Automated PDF data extraction
projects.description: Daily scraping system for a public financial institution. Downloads PDFs, extracts info like budget, contract, entity, province, and duration, and generates an Excel report with AI summary.

projects.title: Home Automation
projects.subtitle: Raspberry Pi smart home
projects.description: Turned my place into a mini smart home with a Raspberry Pi. Control lights, check temps, that kind of stuff. Still adding features.

projects.title: CopyClip
projects.subtitle: Clipboard manager for Linux
projects.description: Missed Windows' clipboard history on Linux, so I built my own. Pin items, search history, custom shortcuts - all the good stuff.
